name: Grow (itch) (Biochromatic)
description:
Grow. A simple game of feeding plants the sunlight they need to survive.

Created by Bryan Whitney as an entry for 3 Hour Game Jam  (http://3hrgamejam.com/).

Sound Effects: http://www.freesfx.co.uk

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/JustMakingGames
